/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -pthread   CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/math_utils/maths_funcs.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/math_utils/quat_funcs.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/log_utils/logger.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/platform/glfw_launcher.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/io/shader_loader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/io/stb_image.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/skybox/skybox.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/camera/camera.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/io/stb_image_write.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/mesh/mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/io/texture.cpp.o CMakeFiles/hardware_skinning.dir/utils/io/video.cpp.o  -o hardware_skinning -rdynamic -pthread -lrt -lXinerama -lXrandr -lXxf86vm -lXi -lX11 -lGLEW -lGLU -lglfw3 -lm -lGLEW -lglfw3 -lrt -lm -ldl -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lXext -lXrender -lXfixes -lX11 -lpthread -lxcb -lXau -lXdmcp -lGLU -lGL libs/libassimp.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/alvaregd/Documents/Games/hardware_skinning/libs
